page.title: 06Ambion Wood
page.content: Ambion Wood is situated in an area surrounded by the villages of Sutton Cheney,Dadlington and Shenton.Nearby is the Ashby Canal. It consists mainly of oak and hazel wood growing on damp boulder clay.There is evidence of Dutch Elm disease. Walking through the woods on 12/6/85 the following flora and fauna were observed.{BIRDS:}Jay,Willow tit,Cuckoo,Kestrel,Whitethroat,Linnet, Great Spotted Woodpecker,Garden Warbler,Willow Warbler,Wren. { FLOWERS}:Honey Suckle,Ivy,Red Clover, Field Forget_me_not,Nipplewort,Garlic Mustard,Stinking Chamomile. { TREES}:Oak,Hazel,Willow,Ash,Birch, Hawthorn,Blackberry,Sycamore,Apple. { INSECTS}:Wood_ant,Horsefly,Cranefly, Froghopper,Water Boatman. { MAMMALS :}Shrew,Grey Squirrel.
